channel.title: Affinity on Chao Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Affinity on Chao Yang

item.title: A developer learns design
item.description: I do not forget the time when I produced a Flash animation in my university and I also had a dream to design a 3D game on my own. So now I have some time to realize my dream and start a learning plan. I bought Affinity Photo and Affinity Designer which are great applications and I am pretty obsessed with these two. I also learn how to program with Unity and 3D model with Maya.
